w:r.w:t: 模型與互動程式開發。內容涵蓋介面規劃、材質渲染及動態邏輯，透過專案實作，培養學生打造數位展示應用的核心能力。

This course uses Unity to develop machine tool showcase Apps, integrating UI/UX design, 3D model optimization, and interactive programming. Students will learn interface planning, rendering, and dynamic logic. Through project-based learning, they will gain the practical skills needed to build digital applications.
掌握Unity開發環境與基礎操作
實作3D模型處理與渲染技術
應用UI/UX原則建構互動介面
運用C#腳本開發核心互動邏輯
整合跨平台專案發布與優化
Master Unity Development Environment and Basics.
Apply UI/UX Principles to Construct Interactive Interfaces.
Develop Core Interactive Logic using C# Scripting.
Integrate Cross-Platform Project Deployment and Optimization.
課程介紹與互動設計概論
Course Introduction and Interaction Design Overview
UI Interface Planning and uGUI Implementation
Introduction to DOTween and UI Animation
Introduction to Interactive Media and Web
前端框架與現代網站開發
Frontend Frameworks and Modern Web Development
能力本位課程與學習成果評量。
理解自身的技能對於改善自己的生活，特別是就業和創業的重要性。
遇到狀況時能釐清問題，透過系統化的資訊蒐集與分析，提出解決方案。
運用各行業所需的資訊技術工具，有效存取、管理、整合並傳遞訊息。
